author: yiannisbot
content:
We've just added new metrics on https://probelab.io ! Apart from the discv5 weekly reports (https://probelab.io/ethereum/discv5/2025-12/), the Gossipsub Block Arrival times (https://probelab.io/ethereum/block_arrival/2025-13/) and the discv5 Keyspace Density (https://probelab.io/ethereum/keydensity/) we now show _daily_ results on a variety of Gossipsub-specific metrics:

- Bandwidth Usage: https://probelab.io/ethereum/gossipsub/bandwidth/2025-13-07/
- Number of Control RPCs: https://probelab.io/ethereum/gossipsub/control_rpcs/2025-13-07/
- Average number of Msg Duplicates: https://probelab.io/ethereum/gossipsub/duplicates/2025-13-07/

Feedback more than welcome.
